casebody.data:
Alva Dewey HUNT v. William H. Hiatt, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia No. 13035. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit April 20, 1950. Alva Dewey Hunt, in pro. per. J. Ellis Mundy, U. S. Atty., Atlanta, Ga., Harvey H. Tisinger, Asst. U. S. Atty., Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge, and McCORD and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the lower court is affirmed.
